comments_since_last_sample.body: I think when the ps5 pro comes out if so. We all will see some 4k 60 up to 4k 120

1080p/60 seems like a poor showing and a massive downgrade in resolution over 4k/30 and it baffles me why there is such a massive drop when 1440p or higher would have been a better option, I mean, surely these new consoles should be able to handle 1440p/60.

Anyway, I suppose we'll find out with how it runs on the PC and how demanding it is.

Gamers: give us 60fps on next-gen consoles!! 

*1080p at 60fps*

Gamers: Nooo not like that!
A last gen game cant run higher than 1080p 60fps on ps5? what the hell?
Considering what I’ve seen on my PS5 and XSX vs this game, the devs clearly just couldn’t be bothered.

Thats why Im getting Xbox SX version VRR...
Sony needs VRR this mode for titles like this
I will never play this
All these old legacy game engines need to be scrapped. Absolutely ridiculous when UE5 exists.

We need sfs ,mesh shading and Vrs t2 .. the xbox series s is really limited when we use the old way of coding games , 
I m sure we could have put a 1080p 60fps on series s with the new tech. But we still need to wait  at least until 2023 before seeing those technologies as standard 😅
Should be nice and patched by the time it reaches Game Pass.
It is too expensive at the moment, I might pick it up when it gets around 20.
Looks great I'll probably get it,but it does seem like it's poorly optimised

I'm sorry but I lost interest in this game as soon as you said it can only do 1080P 60FPS on the PS5 and Xbox Series X. If you can't at least give me a dynamic 1440P with a mostly locked 60FPS in an action game this generation then I'm honestly not interested.

This game is running on a 2070/6700xt at 60-67 fps minimum at ultra settings 1440p
It should run it the same as pc on consoles.
I think they just rushed it.
1080p 60fps on the PS5 and Xbox Series X ??????????????? FUCK my life :)))))))))) what a joke it is that the new consoles can't do 4K 60fps...

Next gen...
Hey, it's not all bad. You have super fast gen 4 nvme storage so you can get into these trainwrecks quicker!

Well on PC even with an RTX2080TI this thing only hits 80fps at 1440p with ULTRA settings without DLSS and Raytracing (According to SkillUp). I simply wouldn't expect it to run native 1440p 60fps even on next gen console.
I’m probably the only one who has been playing it on PS five at 60 and loving the visuals

Why have you stopped comparing with previous generation consoles PS4 PRO and Xbox One X, majority of people sit on the older consoles and then the comparison between PS5 series X becomes meaningless.

And it's a big disappointment that you can not play the latest games in 4K 60fps, what was the point of these consoles?? You can play the game on Xbox One X in 4K and 30fps so I see no reason to get a console that runs the game much like previous generation consoles.
